motivational.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle.
motivational.author: Steve Jobs

motivational.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
motivational.author: Steve Jobs

motivational.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
motivational.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

motivational.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
motivational.author: Confucius

motivational.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
motivational.author: Winston Churchill

motivational.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
motivational.author: Theodore Roosevelt

motivational.quote: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
motivational.author: George Addair

motivational.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
motivational.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

motivational.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
motivational.author: Zig Ziglar

motivational.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
motivational.author: Buddha

motivational.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
motivational.author: Chinese Proverb

motivational.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
motivational.author: Sam Levenson

motivational.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
motivational.author: C.S. Lewis

motivational.quote: If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.
motivational.author: Anonymous

motivational.quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
motivational.author: Winston Churchill

motivational.quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
motivational.author: Anonymous

motivational.quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
motivational.author: Norman Vaughan

motivational.quote: Your passion is waiting for your courage to catch up.
motivational.author: Isabelle Lafleche

motivational.quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
motivational.author: Muhammad Ali

motivational.quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
motivational.author: Milton Berle

motivational.quote: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
motivational.author: Jimmy Johnson

motivational.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
motivational.author: Mark Twain

motivational.quote: Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine.
motivational.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivational.quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
motivational.author: Stephen Covey

motivational.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
motivational.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

motivational.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
motivational.author: Henry David Thoreau

motivational.quote: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
motivational.author: Carol Burnett

motivational.quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
motivational.author: Mahatma Gandhi

motivational.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
motivational.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

motivational.quote: Happiness is not something readymade. It comes from your own actions.
motivational.author: Dalai Lama

motivational.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
motivational.author: Nelson Mandela

motivational.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
motivational.author: Walt Disney

motivational.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
motivational.author: John Lennon

motivational.quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
motivational.author: Mother Teresa

motivational.quote: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
motivational.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

reality.quote: The world doesn't care about your self-esteem. The world will expect you to accomplish something before you feel good about yourself.
reality.author: Bill Gates

reality.quote: If you think you're too small to make a difference, try sleeping with a mosquito.
reality.author: Dalai Lama

reality.quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.
reality.author: Tim Notke

reality.quote: The first and greatest victory is to conquer yourself.
reality.author: Plato

reality.quote: Comfort is the enemy of achievement.
reality.author: Farrah Gray

reality.quote: You want to know the difference between a master and a beginner? The master has failed more times than the beginner has even tried.
reality.author: Stephen McCranie

reality.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
reality.author: Aristotle

reality.quote: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
reality.author: Anonymous

reality.quote: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
reality.author: Abraham Lincoln

reality.quote: Don't wish it were easier. Wish you were better.
reality.author: Jim Rohn

reality.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
reality.author: Vidal Sassoon

reality.quote: Your excuses are just the lies your fears have sold you.
reality.author: David Goggins

reality.quote: If you're not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
reality.author: Jim Rohn

reality.quote: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
reality.author: Anonymous

reality.quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
reality.author: Zig Ziglar

reality.quote: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself as to why you can't achieve it.
reality.author: Jordan Belfort

reality.quote: If it's important to you, you'll find a way. If not, you'll find an excuse.
reality.author: Ryan Blair

reality.quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
reality.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

reality.quote: You can't build a reputation on what you're going to do.
reality.author: Henry Ford

reality.quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
reality.author: Confucius

reality.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
reality.author: Wayne Gretzky

reality.quote: Talent is cheaper than table salt. What separates the talented individual from the successful one is a lot of hard work.
reality.author: Stephen King

reality.quote: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
reality.author: Beverly Sills

reality.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
reality.author: Steve Jobs

reality.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
reality.author: Thomas Jefferson

reality.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
reality.author: Winston Churchill

reality.quote: The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me.
reality.author: Ayn Rand

reality.quote: It's not about having time, it's about making time.
reality.author: Anonymous

reality.quote: The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.
reality.author: Anonymous

reality.quote: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
reality.author: David Goggins

reality.quote: People who wonder if the glass is half empty or full miss the point. The glass is refillable.
reality.author: Anonymous

reality.quote: The struggle you're in today is developing the strength you need for tomorrow.
reality.author: Robert Tew

reality.quote: If you really want to do something, you'll find a way. If you don't, you'll find an excuse.
reality.author: Jim Rohn

reality.quote: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
reality.author: Jim Rohn

reality.quote: The only bad workout is the one that didn't happen.
reality.author: Anonymous

general.quote: Gratitude turns what we have into enough.
general.author: Melody Beattie

general.quote: Gratitude is the healthiest of all human emotions.
general.author: Zig Ziglar

general.quote: Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues, but the parent of all others.
general.author: Cicero

general.quote: When I started counting my blessings, my whole life turned around.
general.author: Willie Nelson

general.quote: Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow.
general.author: Melody Beattie

professional.quote: Develop an attitude of gratitude, and give thanks for everything that happens to you, knowing that every step forward is a step toward achieving something bigger and better than your current situation.
professional.author: Brian Tracy

professional.quote: The way to develop the best that is in a person is by appreciation and encouragement.
professional.author: Charles Schwab

professional.quote: Feeling gratitude and not expressing it is like wrapping a present and not giving it.
professional.author: William Arthur Ward

professional.quote: Be thankful for what you have; you'll end up having more. If you concentrate on what you don't have, you will never, ever have enough.
professional.author: Oprah Winfrey

professional.quote: Gratitude is the sign of noble souls.
professional.author: Aesop

family.quote: The family is one of nature's masterpieces.
family.author: George Santayana

family.quote: In family life, love is the oil that eases friction, the cement that binds closer together, and the music that brings harmony.
family.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

family.quote: Family is not an important thing. It's everything.
family.author: Michael J. Fox

family.quote: The love of family and the admiration of friends is much more important than wealth and privilege.
family.author: Charles Kuralt

family.quote: Other things may change us, but we start and end with the family.
family.author: Anthony Brandt

parent.quote: There is no such thing as a perfect parent. So just be a real one.
parent.author: Sue Atkins

parent.quote: Your children need your presence more than your presents.
parent.author: Jesse Jackson

parent.quote: The most important thing that parents can teach their children is how to get along without them.
parent.author: Frank A. Clark

parent.quote: Each day of our lives we make deposits in the memory banks of our children.
parent.author: Charles R. Swindoll

parent.quote: Children are not a distraction from more important work. They are the most important work.
parent.author: C.S. Lewis

student.quote: Education is the passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.
student.author: Malcolm X

student.quote: The beautiful thing about learning is that no one can take it away from you.
student.author: B.B. King

student.quote: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
student.author: W.B. Yeats

student.quote: The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go.
student.author: Dr. Seuss

student.quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
student.author: Mahatma Gandhi

caregiver.quote: To care for those who once cared for us is one of the highest honors.
caregiver.author: Tia Walker

caregiver.quote: Caregiving often calls us to lean into love we didn't know possible.
caregiver.author: Tia Walker

caregiver.quote: There are only four kinds of people in the world: those who have been caregivers, those who are currently caregivers, those who will be caregivers, and those who will need caregivers.
caregiver.author: Rosalynn Carter

caregiver.quote: Caregiving is a constant learning experience.
caregiver.author: Vivian Frazier

caregiver.quote: Self-care is not selfish. You cannot serve from an empty vessel.
caregiver.author: Eleanor Brown

health.quote: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
health.author: Buddha

health.quote: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
health.author: Jim Rohn

health.quote: Health is not valued until sickness comes.
health.author: Thomas Fuller

health.quote: He who has health has hope, and he who has hope has everything.
health.author: Arabian Proverb

entrepreneur.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
entrepreneur.author: Steve Jobs

entrepreneur.quote: Risk more than others think is safe. Dream more than others think is practical.
entrepreneur.author: Howard Schultz

entrepreneur.quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
entrepreneur.author: John D. Rockefeller

entrepreneur.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
entrepreneur.author: Peter Drucker

entrepreneur.quote: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
entrepreneur.author: Winston Churchill
